title: Can students see each other's work in Google Classroom? - Quora

response.answer_text: A2A: That depends on how you have it set up. I often use a single Google Doc that I give all students can EDIT. In this way, students can see real-time what each individual is adding, editing, etc. Without giving multiple students access to the same document (one feature is that it will generate a copy of the document for each student), they will likely only see what they have. Hope this helps.
If the teacher sets it up for students to view others’ work, then yes, students can see each other, but it must be allowed by the teacher as there is a specific setting for that option.
No, they can’t see each others work but only the teacher can view, edit and comment on it then return it so, the student can view.
